languages.text: "Великолепное платье, которое ты мне подарил{mf||а}, тоже тут. Надеюсь, однажды его наденет более достойная".
"The sumptuous gown you gave me is here as well. I hope one day it will be worn by someone more worthy of it."
languages.original_text: "Великолепное платье, которое ты мне подарил{mf||а}, тоже тут. Надеюсь, однажды его наденет более достойная".

traits.locale_text: "The sumptuous gown you gave me is here as well. I hope one day it will be worn by someone more worthy of it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The sumptuous gown you gave me is here as well. I hope one day it will be worn by someone more worthy of it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你送给我漂亮的衣服也在这里。我希望有一天，它能被更配得上它的人穿在身上。”
languages.original_text: "The sumptuous gown you gave me is here as well. I hope one day it will be worn by someone more worthy of it."

traits.locale_text: “你送给我漂亮的衣服也在这里。我希望有一天，它能被更配得上它的人穿在身上。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「アンタからもらった立派なガウンもここにあるよ。いつか、このガウンにふさわしい人が着てくれることを願っている」
languages.original_text: "The sumptuous gown you gave me is here as well. I hope one day it will be worn by someone more worthy of it."

traits.locale_text: 「アンタからもらった立派なガウンもここにあるよ。いつか、このガウンにふさわしい人が着てくれることを願っている」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «El suntuoso vestido que me regaló también está aquí. Espero que algún día lo lleve puesto alguien que sea más digna de él».
languages.original_text: "The sumptuous gown you gave me is here as well. I hope one day it will be worn by someone more worthy of it."

traits.locale_text: «El suntuoso vestido que me regaló también está aquí. Espero que algún día lo lleve puesto alguien que sea más digna de él».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai aussi rapporté la magnifique robe que vous m'aviez offerte. J'espère qu'un jour, elle sera portée par quelqu'un qui en sera vraiment digne. »
languages.original_text: "The sumptuous gown you gave me is here as well. I hope one day it will be worn by someone more worthy of it."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai aussi rapporté la magnifique robe que vous m'aviez offerte. J'espère qu'un jour, elle sera portée par quelqu'un qui en sera vraiment digne. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Auch Eure luxuriöse Robe ist dabei. Ich hoffe, eines Tages wird sie jemand tragen, der würdiger ist."
languages.original_text: "The sumptuous gown you gave me is here as well. I hope one day it will be worn by someone more worthy of it."

traits.locale_text: "Auch Eure luxuriöse Robe ist dabei. Ich hoffe, eines Tages wird sie jemand tragen, der würdiger ist."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bana verdiğin şatafatlı kıyafet de burada. Umarım bir gün ona layık biri tarafından giyilir."
languages.original_text: "The sumptuous gown you gave me is here as well. I hope one day it will be worn by someone more worthy of it."

traits.locale_text: "Bana verdiğin şatafatlı kıyafet de burada. Umarım bir gün ona layık biri tarafından giyilir."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
